Title: Detection of Educational Influencers and Communities on TikTok
Abstract: tiktok is a video sharing social networking service that has rapidly grown in recent years. tiktok reached 1.2 billion monthly active users in q4 2021 and is expected to reach 1.8 billion by the end of 2022. tiktok compared to other social networks has a higher audience engagement allowing information to be broadcasted quickly and effectively. in order to facilitate communities' exploration and topics identification we present a study that includes the social networks analysis techniques in conjunction with the statistical and machine learning approaches applied to tiktok #learnontiktok campaign data to explore and provide insightful and valuable information about influencers groups and educational areas and thus develop a data driven culture for decision making.
